item.title: Kisi Subah
item.description: A night of September 2018 and some random weekend when I was chilling with my friends at a house party in Bangalore. Most of the weekends (and even weekdays) you will find almost all IT employees here grabbing a drink and catching up with friends or colleagues. So just like everyone else, I was enjoying it too. Though on the other side of the story there was someone waiting for that daily call and I was breaking a habit tonight, which pissed her off.
